abstract: The president of the Condé Nast Media Group has developed an agencylike business within the ad sales unit.
snippet: The president of the Condé Nast Media Group has developed an agencylike business within the ad sales unit.
lead_paragraph: Like executives at advertising agencies, Richard D. Beckman and his team talk to managers at consumer brand companies about the customers they want to reach. Four to six weeks later, they present a marketing and advertising plan.

headline.main: Publishers Creating Their Own In-House Ad Agencies
headline.print_headline: Publishers Creating Their Own In-House Ad Agencies
